label: Provide a dedicated customer service telephone number
quote: A dedicated telephone number to contact customer service within a fixed period;

label: Provide information for registrants/enrollees to access credit reports and scores
quote: Information necessary for registrants/enrollees to access credit reports and credit scores;

label: Submit weekly reports on call center volume, issue escalation, and key metrics
quote: Weekly reports on call center volume, issue escalation (i.e., those calls that cannot be handled by call center staff and must be resolved by call center management or DHS, as appropriate), and other key metrics;

label: Escalate unresolved calls to management or DHS as appropriate
quote: Escalation of calls that cannot be handled by call center staff to call center management or DHS, as appropriate;

label: Provide customized FAQs approved by Contracting Officer and Privacy Officer
quote: Customized Frequently Asked Questions, approved in writing by the Contracting Officer in coordination with the Component or Headquarters Privacy Officer;

label: Provide information for registrants to contact customer service and fraud resolution representatives
quote: Information for registrants to contact customer service representatives and fraud resolution representatives for credit monitoring assistance.
